name: Can You Dab On a Hoverboard - Flip Board Simulator
name_original: Can You Dab On a Hoverboard - Flip Board Simulator
description:
Ever thought about dabbing while cruising on a hoverboard? Well now you can! Zip through the streets but beware! The oil spills are coming for you and you need to escape with your board!

[How to Play]
►There are 4 exits, use your finger to swipe up, down, left, or right when the light shows the way!
►Collect coins to unlock new characters
►Use power up packs for help!
►Don't sleep! There are different & unique levels to keep you on your heels!

[Features]
►Sleek and easy to play game mechanics
►Great casual game for all ages
►Fun & addictive gameplay

Don't wait, download now and dab on the hoverboard!!
